snippet.title: Autumn Leaves - Intro
snippet.description:
RELEASE OCTOBER 1ST - 2015
DOWNLOAD THE MOD HERE : http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/50146/?

Walk the Mojave one last time, and discovers the mysteries of the Library of Hypatia.

Autumn Leaves is a DLC-Sized Quest Mod featuring :

•                 Over 2,000 Lines of Professionally-Voiced Dialogue
•                 Compelling characters with their own quirks and flaws
•                 8 Tightly Intertwined Quests with several possible routes 
•                 Many New Perks unlockable through Player Choices
•                 Several Endings -  typical Fallout slideshow flavour
•                 The hilarious participation of JohnnyUtah 
•                 Original Soundtrack made by Pablo Coma
•                 More than 7 hours of Gameplay
